items.title: Instagram updates its Map feature to make it easier to tell if you’re sharing your location
items.description: Instagram is adding a more prominent indicator at the top of the Map to remind users whether or not they’re sharing their location.

items.title: 6 Best Mesh Wi-Fi Systems (2025), Tested in a Tech Reviewer's Home
